title: AI heads unite: NVIDIA, AMD, Intel CEOs to attend Computex│TVBS新聞網
text: Share： S M L TAIPEI (TVBS News) — Expecting to be an AI feast this year, the 2024 Computex Taipei is set to run from June 4 to 7. The organizer, Taiwan External Trade Development Council (TAITRA), has announced on Thursday (March 7) that Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger has been invited to deliver a keynote speech.Many anticipate that Gelsinger's address will focus on the new look of the AI PC era, given this year's theme, "Connecting AI."
